turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Hey how are you?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I'm doing well, just finished my dinner.  How about yourself?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Pretty good. So the researcher would like us to make a donation to Save the Children. It seems like a good cause, would you like to donate?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Absolutely!  Do you know what Save the Children does as a charity?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yeah, it promotes childrens rights and provides help and support for kids in developing countries. I always try to donate to charities for children

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Gotcha, that sounds like a worthy cause.  How do you feel about donating all of the money?

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I'd be all for that. It might as well go to kids who are in need. So you would like to donate the full $2?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Yeah, let's go for it.  I'd rather kids in need get the money.  I'm trying to get into the habit of donating more these days, so this is a good way to start

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: That is awesome, we'll both have done our good deed for the day too

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Exactly!  Now I can sleep with a good conscience tonight haha

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: haha thats right. So I looked at a little more info about the charity and apparently they helped a lot with Syrian children that were targets of violence

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Oh man, now I wish I could donate more.  But I bet this 2 dollars will go a long way to helping those kids.  Every little bit counts!

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Yeah, two dollars doesnt seem like much to us, but its probably a huge help for children in poverty

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: It's horrifying to think about what those kids have been through.  I can't begin to imagine how they must feel right now.  It's not fair they are dealing with their situation at that age when all I was worrying about was who was the most popular kid in class.

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: I agree. Its hard to even think about living in a place that's violent, impoverished and where every day is difficult. It does make our problems seem pretty trivial

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: I stubbed my toe this morning and thought it was the worst thing ever.  Now, I don't feel that it was all that bad

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: haha yeah really! I hope other people doing this study decide to donate all of their money too. That would be a lot of help!

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: Seriously!  It'd be really neat to be able to see how many people donated to the cause

turns.speaker: speaker1
turns.text: Agreed. Some researchers do send that info out after their studies (maybe they'll see our convo and do it!).  So I think that's our 10 messages. We're agreeing to donate the full amount, right?

turns.speaker: speaker2
turns.text: That'd be really cool.  Hey researchers, please send us the info!  And yes, let's donate the full amount.
